A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I absolutely\, wholeheartedly believe that I and many others saw a completely different movie than a lot of people. I have seen every single Star Wars movie at least 10 times\, including the newest ones. This was an incredible movie that I am so stoked to see at least another 9 times because of its beautiful visual design\, perfect framework for a movie with no true beginning and no true ending\, with some amazing performances all around
